section.name: Synchronise Options
section.note: Metadata Fields setup will only appear here if a valid Repository Name or ID is supplied.

field.note: This will trash old files (including their links elsewhere), update modified files and create new files.
The root folder name. E.g. the Document Library name (case sensitive). All files must be located under this root folder and not under any sub-folders.
Enter the unique ID of the Repository as an alternative to the 'Repository Name' above. Needed when e.g. using Sharepoint Subsite Document Libraries.

'Modified' and 'cmis:objectId' fields are required for synchronisation. 'Modified' field must use a Metadata Date Field with the default 'Display Format' (d/m/Y H:i:s). 'cmis:objectId' must use a Metadata Text Field. Selected metadata fields must belong to a schema applied to this bridge with cascades turned on.
